Reviews.Title: Details ... Dad likes it.
Reviews.Author: Ohioszo "Daughter"
Reviews.Content: It would be nice for it to have two doorbells included, but, perhaps there is a reason it does not.There is double sided sticky tape for the doorbell and for only one of the alerts and its magnet.There are screws, which I have not used (yet.)I used some furnace tape to put an alert on the mailbox.My Dad is elderly, and, he likes the extra chime when the door is opened.  I like it too, for I know when he has opened the door. The mailbox alert has not helped us yet.

Reviews.Title: Worked 5 times
Reviews.Author: Adam mitchell
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money. I tested it out before I installed it and it worked fine and after I mounted them they worked about five times then they both quit working. I changed the batteries and nothing happened.

Reviews.Title: meh
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: range is shorter than advertised there is a slight delay in the trigger the jumpers are a pain could have used a dip switch bank

Reviews.Title: Works only up to 25 feet
Reviews.Author: Alan B.
Reviews.Content: I was very dissapointed in the range of this unit. The most I could get was only 25'. That may be fine in an apartment or small home, but it was useless in my house.  I purchased new batteries, as the ones that came with the unit tested bad, but that made no difference in the range.  I would not recommend this unit!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working!
Reviews.Author: pp
Reviews.Content: One of the two detectors were defective out of the box. The other stopped working after a month. I paid for nothing!

Reviews.Title: works sometimes
Reviews.Author: SCOTT A
Reviews.Content: Installed at the office to monitor two doors.  It works sometimes.  Mounting tape is worthless but some Scotch mounting tape works fine.  Going to try new batteries to see if that helps.

Reviews.Title: I wish it was louder
Reviews.Author: chanel Chouteau
Reviews.Content: WE Installed this at our office and I have to say it is very hard to hear. I tried adjusting the valume but it don't seem to get any louder.  it will do and the cost is low so I guess you get what you pay for. Note shipping was very fast.

Reviews.Title: Randomly goes off
Reviews.Author: pesavento
Reviews.Content: Great concept but doorbell randomly rings. I think it's interference from something but eventually had to remove it as it drove me mad.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work as described
Reviews.Author: jim frank
Reviews.Content: this item only works approx. 50% of the time, of the times it does work, it does not reach anywhere near the described distance.  Really not good!

Reviews.Title: Pathetic range - not useful
Reviews.Author: Charles R. Young
Reviews.Content: The range on this is only about 20 feet.  This defeats the entire purpose of a wireless door annunciation product when the transmitter and receiver have to be nearly side by side to work.  I want to be alerted in my bedroom at one end of  my average size three bedroom house whenever someone enters from the garage area. It is about 50 ft distance with 2 sheetrock walls between.  The door would never alert with the receiver placed  in the bedroom.  I moved the receiver to a location in the hallway about 30 feet from the entry door transmitter with only one wall between them.  It would alert about 40% of the time - certainly not helpful!I thought maybe the battery that came with the transmitter might be weak, so I spent $4 on another of these special batteries.  It did not help.I finally moved the receiver to the family room directly in sight of the transmitter.  Yep, it works - except that I cannot hear it back in the bedroom which was the whole purpose of the purchase.In conclusion, I could only recommend this product if you live in a small studio or one bedroom apartment.

Reviews.Title: Does not sense correctly, adhesive is worthless
Reviews.Author: C. Courson "Baby Gear Expert"
Reviews.Content: I tried to install this several times, but the adhesive provided fell apart worthless. Had to get different foam tape. When installed, it only sensed doors open and closed about half the time, and didn't sound the other half of the time. Currently not in use, waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Great price.
Reviews.Author: Kelgeb
Reviews.Content: Awesome. I bought them for my mischievous kids who like to sneak out if the house. They get the job done but not 100% reliable other.

Reviews.Title: Works better at less that 50ft
Reviews.Author: R. M. Aitken "Love Gadgets"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to install one on front door and the other on the back door. The front door works fine every time, the back door works once every twenty times! The front door has about 30ft between the sensor and chimer, the back is about 50ft away. Unfortunately we do not have a plug socket 40ft from each sensor!!

ProductInfo.Features: WIRELESS PLUG-IN DOOR CHIME KIT INCLUDES 2 DOOR ENTRY TRANSMITTERS; UP TO 100-FT TRANSMISSION RANGE; 8 NOTE WESTMINISTER OR 2 NOTE MELODY FOR FRONT ENTRANCE & 1 NOTE FOR REAR ENTRANCE; VOLUME CONTROL; 1 YEAR WARRANTY; WHITE
ProductInfo.Name: Wireless Plugin Chime Kit
